prompt:
Recruiting & Human Resources
Accounting & Consulting
Fixed
I am one of two female founders building the growing luxury resale Facebook group, HIGH END. We have a thriving community of over 110,000 people and the time has come for us to transition across to a new and improved platform - Website or App marketplace MVP. 

We're after a quote to build a website, and an app - we will only move forward with one of these. It is a 2 sided marketplace we are building. Some is P2P and some will be mandatory to go through a second approval and quality control in person with our business.  We are aiming to position HIGH END as the leading global platform for luxury resale. The app or website will enable audiences to engage with a highly curated, trusted and comprehensive collection of luxury resale goods. 

At the heart of the HIGH END app/website is the user’s ability to quickly find items of interest, assess them and then initiate the authentication and purchase process. The home screen must enable discovery through featured content and collections, while search and filtering need to be intuitive and fast. The item detail screen should showcase the product and enable rapid access to details such as authentication status, make, model, year, condition and of course price.   

We want to build upon our strong foundation, ensuring that the highest level of security and authentication is applied at all stages of the listing and sale process, encompassing:   

-Seller application, admin review of product uploads and approvals  
-Authentication of items (both manual and automated): Some items (dependent on brand) will need to be sent in house for physical authentication once the item has been sold, others can be shipped directly seller to buyer (peer to peer)  
-Cart, checkout, shipment tracking and funds transfer  
-Secure payment processing: escrow model for items that require in house authentication  
-User points system: VIP content access, free shipping etc, that can be chosen when using their points balance. Points are allocated by the engagement the user has with us  
-User account management  
-Automated product authentication: To be a future GCP plug in (just a note in case this impacts the build - nothing else required at this stage)   

We already have been through design and discovery and have our wireframes.

-

prompt:
AI & Machine Learning
Data Science & Analytics
Hourly
 Please read our project description in detail before applying for this project.

We currently have a need for someone to help us use the ChatGPT API to develop medical content that is unique, accurate and follows our specific requirements.

Project Scope: We are looking to develop detailed reports on 300 different diseases. Each report will be between 30,000 words and is broken down into 62 sections. These 62 sections will be the same across the 300 different diseases. For example, symptoms, treatment options, etc.

Hurdles we have encountered: So far when we used Chat GPT 4 manually, we ran accross a few issues. As part of your bid, please tell us if these issues can be resolved using the API or some other method you can intergrate in to the script you will develop for us:

1) Our prompts are so detailed for each of the 62 sections that we often would hit the character limit on the web interface. Even when we told Chat GPT that we would submit our prompts as multiple submissions, it would start to ignore the multiple prompts and start providing the response prematurely.

2) While we do have API access, we don't have access to the web browsing apps. However, for some sections we need Chat GPT to analyze web content, for example, Amazon product pages or Google Scholar results for medical research. Would there be a way for us to get Chat GPT to carry out real-time web browsing analysis?

3) We have already done content on many diseases so in some ways, we have perfect examples of how we would like Chat GPT to deliver the content in each of the 62 sections for each disease. Is there a way for us to train the Chat GPT language model on our own data so that it knows how the content should flow, its tone, etc?

4) A lot of sections are meant to be written based on the content developed for a previous section. In other words, for some sections, we want Chat GPT to take the content output of a previously generated section content and then do a new analysis/writeup based on specific requirements. Will the API allow us to use a piece of content we developed and give it to Chat GPT to use it as preliminary content to base a new writeup on?

The interface we want: Here is how we envision the interface you will be creating and the functionality that will go with it:

1) There should be an Admin login where we can securely access the interface (we only plan on having 1 user)

2) Once logged in, Admin should be able to create a new "Project" which is basically one of the 300 diseases. Admin should also be able to view other projects that have already been created.

3) Once a project is created, Admin should be able to add sections that the content should have. 

- For each section, Admin should be able to provide detailed requirements on tone, length, any content points that must be included. 

- Admin should also be able to provide examples of that section done for other diseases so that Chat GPT knows exactly how the content should be written. 

- Admin should also be able tell Chat GPT to use the content generated for another previous section to do the writeup for the current section

4) When Admin is done creating all sections and has provided detailed requirements for each section, there should be a "Generate Content" button that starts the content generation process. The content should be posted by each section.

5) Admin should be able to then further improve the content for each section by providing feedback for that particular section and then have the option to either have the content for the section rewritten or the entire document rewritten with the new feedback in mind. 

-------
Since this is going to be an ongoing, longterm project, please be detailed with your bid to let us know the following:

- How long you anticipate the project to take to launch?

- How do you anticipate addressing the 4 hurdles we encountered with the web version of Chat GPT?

- Why you would be a good fit for this particular project?

Thank you in advance for taking your time to consider this job.
United States
50.0-120.0
3 to 6 months

I am looking to develop a website for my referral business. Quick summary: a prospect would be looking for an assisted living facility with specific demographics. They would either go to my website and fill out a form/speak with AI chat that will get the demographics they are looking for, then it would automatically select the top 5 facilities and would automatically email/SMS those facilities the prospect's information. Or they would call the business # and the call center would get their info and input in to the site, after which the top 5 facilities would get the prospect information by email/SMS. I am looking to automated as much as possible. The third way a prospect can be entered is though an employee/affiliate. Basically the employees would need to login to their account, and enter info for a new prospect. After this the call center would call and verify the data and it would go in to the funnel for the facilities. The employee should be able to see the status of their lead. Is the prospect still looking or did they find a facility. The site would have two major components/Databases. 

1 - Database of all Assisted Living facilities that I am contracted with. I will start with a few but will build up to thousands. These Assisted Living facilities should be visible on the front end and each would have a basic profile with photos and a description. I would also like to have their profile pull their google reviews on to their page. The front end should be able to filter the database with specific criteria. On the back end, if possible, I would like to be able to email/SMS the facilities individually or in mass. 

2 - Database of Employees/Affiliates. I am looking to have thousands of employees as well. All would have an account where they would be able to fill out a form to submit a new prospect, and also to track the status of the leads that they have previously submitted. Sign up process would be open to all and should be easy. We would have 2 options, a free sign up or a paid sign up. 

At some point later on, I would like to have an App for the Employees/Affiliates. It would have basic options just like on the website, Just submit new prospect and to track the prospects they submitted.
